# Open Resources
- [Taiwan Stock Market API Documentation](https://openapi.twse.com.tw/#/)
- [FinLab](https://doc.finlab.tw/reference/finlab/)
We use finlab to get stock data and technical indicators from taiwan.

## Libraries Used
- **shiny** for interactive website and dashboard.
- **plotly** for interactive plots.
- **pandas** for data manipulation and analysis.
- **numpy** for numerical computing.
- **scikit-learn** for machine learning models.
- **yfinance** for fetching historical market data from Yahoo Finance.
- **matplotlib** and **seaborn** for data visualization.
- **twstock** for Taiwan stock market data.
- **sqlite3** for database management.
